text: Literally made an account just to say how disappointed I am with this movie no characters from the original series poor progression and just dumbed down to an extreme extent I watched every spy kids movie as a kid and loved them so even though I’m extremely bias towards the series I can’t find a way to like this one

The movie was ok, I didn’t expect much after seeing the reviews, honestly, this movie doesn’t deserve this many negative reviews. It’s a least a 60% in my eyes. Anyway, movie decent, fight scene looks like it came out of a Disney Star Wars film 🤮. The animation was good sometimes but not always.

Filme fraco, o roteiro é fraco, as cenas são fracas, a história é fraca, o elenco é fraco, e ninguém ajuda a melhorar o filme, os personagens são fracos, e o filme deveria ter cenas bem melhores e relevantes, para fazer o filme ser bom, e os efeitos especiais são ruins.

Okay so I have seen every spy kids made and I am partial to the very first three. As years went by I was disappointed with the other spykids movies which did drop the ball. But today I decided to watch spykids: Armageddon movie with my 6 year old and it pleasantly surprised me. It brought me back to when I was 6 years old watching the originals. It had a good plot with a good lesson and point that as spy's can do anything so why can't you do good while being good person which brought me a great nostalgia when watching. Plus my son loved it so much he is already planning to watch it again. I recommend watching it with gamers and gamer kids all alike.
I signed into this website for the first time in 10 years to tell you not watch this with your kids. So bad. I feel stupider for having watched it. You have been warned.
Muito ruim, a trama é um lixo, o vilão é qualquer coisa, as crianças não são horrorosas, mas eu não consigo me importar com ela, os pais são uma grande piada, é capenga, é ruim
The Film Also Had A Disappearence Of Ingrid,Gregrio,Floop,The Giggles Family And Machete

*Spy Kids: Armageddon* is a disappointing attempt at reviving a beloved franchise. The absence of Juni and Carmen Cortez leaves a gaping hole that no amount of CGI can fill. The film's humor falls flat, with not a single laugh to be found, making the comedic moments feel forced and awkward. The plot is painfully thin and predictable, offering little in terms of excitement or surprise.

Billy Magnussen's villain lacks any real menace or depth, coming off as a cartoonish caricature rather than a legitimate threat. Zachary Levi and Gina Rodriguez do their best to inject life into their roles, but the weak script gives them little to work with. The film misses the heart and charm that made the original series special, resulting in a dull, lifeless experience. Unfortunately, *Spy Kids: Armageddon* fails to recapture the magic, leaving me bored and disappointed.

"Pequenos Espiões: Armagedom" é uma obra que, francamente, nunca deveria ter visto a luz do dia. O roteiro é absolutamente desastroso, desprovido de qualquer substância ou coerência narrativa. Os jovens atores, embora esforçados, claramente carecem da experiência necessária para sustentar um filme desta magnitude. O desfecho, insípido e repleto de clichês, apenas reforça a sensação de que este é um projeto forçado, que tenta, sem sucesso, se alinhar ao crescente mercado de filmes "family-friendly".

O que mais surpreende é a fragilidade dos efeitos especiais, que parecem ter sido desenvolvidos sem qualquer preocupação com qualidade ou inovação. Em um momento em que o público espera mais de produções voltadas para crianças, este filme se destaca negativamente em todos os aspectos: enredo, direção, e execução técnica. É, sem dúvida, uma obra que jamais deveria ter superado a fase de concepção. A aprovação desse projeto por parte dos executivos da Netflix levanta sérias questões sobre os critérios utilizados para selecionar e produzir conteúdo.

I loved the first three and felt the fourth one was okay. This one on the other hand was not good… at all. It’s basically a carbon copy of the first movie and the third movie mixed into one. It doesn’t include any of the original stars and doesn’t have the same feel as the first 3. Some movies do not need to be rebooted…
It's just ok. That's all it's ok.
Great loved it! Reminded me a lot of the old spy kids movies love to see it the actors where great for this movie
Such a good ending- a number 2 would be awesome.
Super cute ending- totally worth the watch. A second one would be much much better.
The last four movies were better then diss.
Isn't what the series used to be.
I found the movie to have a fun video game concept but other then that it was just ok at best .

Me: Of course the original Spy Kids holds a special place in our heart 😿though this movie is just as fantastic as the original 😻
My Fennekin ( Fenn ): Spy Kids Armageddon is a very delightful start to a new generation and family in a Spy Kids Movie 😸
Me: well not everyone in the family is perfect and it dose start a bit slow with a unlikable father🫤+😼. Though once we get to the 2nd half of the movie that's when the best part's finally reach there full potential 🤩
My Pikachu: Yah. Like the story have some great inspiration from all 3 movies into making something engaging 😸
My Brionne ( Poppy ): The score is really great and regretted it to be just like the actual original music😻+🤩
My Rimbombee ( TinkerBell ): And it at least gives every single one of the characters some perfect character developments in this case 😊+😄
My Piplup: if your fans of the spy kid's franchise that giving it a chance is a must😏
My Vaniluxe ( Icy ): And it will obviously will never be a Spy Kids 4-D in any single possible 😏+😋
My Pachirisu: We don't talk about 4-D😾. But yah this might also upstage the other Troublemaker studios movie as well 😸
My Fennekin ( Fenn ): I th ink this is the beginning of some equally just as exciting as the futures for Both dreamworks & Disney as well😻+🥰
My Pikachu: So which studio you think will sky Rocket to the peak the most 😸
Story: 9/10
Visuals: 8.5/10
Characters: 9/10
Score: 10/10
Overall: 9.5/10
Years to late. Very outdated.

It's about everything you expect it to be. Take every trope from the first three and somehow make it feel worse. Only redeeming quality is the funny child acting and lines that can be taken out of context. This is not good, but in all fairness, 7 year old me probably would've loved it. It's still a not good.
